entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0004.9282] Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest with a value of 1,519,381,000 is not equal to the combined total of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI and Noncontrolling Interest ( 1,326,750,000 + 175,875,000 ) with a value of 1,502,625,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this us-gaap:StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest fact are: Period :2023-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of Stockholders Equity Including Noncontrolling Interest : -3 Decimals of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI : -3 Decimals of Noncontrolling Interest : -3
Rule Element Id:9282 Rule version: 26.0.9 - codi-20241231.htm 8
